title: Aurora's Wake
description: Aurora.It's a name that no one has spoken in decades...Could this name be the key that finally unlocks the mystery that has haunted the descendants of the Solstice Twins for so many tortured generations? Or is it a piece of Gretchel Bloome's history that has been purposefully hidden away from inquiring minds?In this fourth installment of The Wicked Garden Series, the Witches of Snyder Farms continue to persevere in the face of otherworldy adversity as the Woman in Wool lurks in the shadows of corn fields and the psyche.
author: Lenora Henson
